Trade/Device Name(s): Dimension Vista Creatinine (CRE2) Flex Reagent Cartridge
Dimension Vista Creatinine (CRE2) Flex® reagent cartridge
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Siemens Dimension Vista Creatinine (CRE2) Flex Reagent Cartridge for quantitative measurement of creatinine in serum, plasma, and urine using a modified kinetic Jaffe method.
Indications for Use Summary: Quantitative measurement of creatinine in human serum, plasma, and urine to aid in diagnosis and treatment of renal disease, monitoring renal dialysis, and calculation basis for other urine analytes.
